text:
Shen Yi-ming (; 30 March 1957 – 2 January 2020) was a Taiwanese Air Force commander. He began his term as the Chief of the General Staff, the head of the Republic of China Armed Forces, in July 2019. He served the role until his death in January 2020.
On 2 January 2020, Shen was killed after being in a helicopter crash in Wulai District, aged 62.
